001package edu.pdx.cs410J.grader;
002
003import edu.pdx.cs410J.ParserException;
004import org.junit.jupiter.api.Test;
005import org.w3c.dom.Document;
006
007import javax.xml.transform.TransformerException;
008import java.io.ByteArrayInputStream;
009import java.io.InputStream;
010import java.io.InputStreamReader;
011import java.time.LocalDateTime;
012
013import static org.hamcrest.MatcherAssert.assertThat;
014import static org.hamcrest.Matchers.*;
015
016public class StudentXmlTest {
017
018  @Test
019  public void letterGradeIsPersistedInXml() throws TransformerException, ParserException {
020    Student student = new Student("test");
021    LetterGrade letterGrade = LetterGrade.A;
022    student.setLetterGrade(letterGrade);
023
024    Student student2 = writeAndReadStudentAsXml(student);
025
026    assertThat(student2.getLetterGrade(), equalTo(letterGrade));
027  }
028
029  private Student writeAndReadStudentAsXml(Student student) throws TransformerException, ParserException {
030    Document doc = XmlDumper.toXml(student);
031    byte[] bytes = XmlHelper.getBytesForXmlDocument(doc);
032
033    XmlStudentParser parser = new XmlStudentParser(new InputStreamReader(new ByteArrayInputStream(bytes)));
034    return parser.parseStudent();
035  }
036
037  @Test
038  public void oneSubmissionIsPersistedInXml() throws TransformerException, ParserException {
039    Student student = new Student("test");
040    String assignmentName = "project";
041    LocalDateTime submissionTime = LocalDateTime.now().minusHours(3).withNano(0);
042
043    Grade grade = new Grade(assignmentName, Grade.NO_GRADE);
044    grade.addSubmissionTime(submissionTime);
045    student.setGrade(assignmentName, grade);
046
047    Student student2 = writeAndReadStudentAsXml(student);
048
049    assertThat(student2.getGrade(assignmentName).getSubmissionTimes(), contains(submissionTime));
050  }
051
052  @Test
053  public void multipleSubmissionsArePersistedInXml() throws TransformerException, ParserException {
054    Student student = new Student("test");
055    String assignmentName = "project";
056    LocalDateTime submissionTime1 = LocalDateTime.now().minusHours(3).withNano(0);
057    LocalDateTime submissionTime2 = LocalDateTime.now().minusHours(4).withNano(0);
058
059    Grade grade = new Grade(assignmentName, Grade.NO_GRADE);
060    grade.addSubmissionTime(submissionTime1);
061    grade.addSubmissionTime(submissionTime2);
062    student.setGrade(assignmentName, grade);
063
064    Student student2 = writeAndReadStudentAsXml(student);
065
066    assertThat(student2.getGrade(assignmentName).getSubmissionTimes(), contains(submissionTime1, submissionTime2));
067  }
068
069  @Test
070  public void enrolledUndergraduateSectionIsPersistedInXml() throws TransformerException, ParserException {
071    Student student = new Student("test");
072    Student.Section section = Student.Section.UNDERGRADUATE;
073    student.setEnrolledSection(section);
074
075    Student student2 = writeAndReadStudentAsXml(student);
076
077    assertThat(student2.getEnrolledSection(), equalTo(section));
078  }
079
080  @Test
081  public void enrolledGraduateSectionIsPersistedInXml() throws TransformerException, ParserException {
082    Student student = new Student("test");
083    Student.Section section = Student.Section.GRADUATE;
084    student.setEnrolledSection(section);
085
086    Student student2 = writeAndReadStudentAsXml(student);
087
088    assertThat(student2.getEnrolledSection(), equalTo(section));
089  }
090
091  @Test
092  public void xmlHasNewlinesButNotIndentation() throws TransformerException {
093    Student student = new Student("test");
094    Document doc = XmlDumper.toXml(student);
095    byte[] bytes = XmlHelper.getBytesForXmlDocument(doc);
096    String string = new String(bytes);
097    assertThat(string, containsString("\n"));
098    assertThat(string.chars().filter(c -> '\n' == c).count(), greaterThan(4L));
099    assertThat(string, not(containsString(" <")));
100  }
101
102  @Test
103  void canParseXmlFileWithSsn() throws ParserException {
104    InputStream resource = getClass().getResourceAsStream("studentWithSsn.xml");
105    XmlStudentParser parser = new XmlStudentParser(new InputStreamReader(resource));
106    Student student = parser.parseStudent();
107    assertThat(student, notNullValue());
108    assertThat(student.getId(), equalTo("studentId"));
109  }
110}
